articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Troupe
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Troupe
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the State Folk Art Troupe.
					 Put on the stage were graceful, dynamic and merry folk dances and music pieces including female folk solo "We Always Remember All Sorts of Hardships Undergone by the Leader", song and dance "Cuckoo", "Beautiful Hometown" and "Song of the Days of the Week" and female trio singing of folk song "Ongheya of Victory of Songun".
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the truly happy life the Korean people enjoy under the loving care of Kim Jong Il and truthfully represented the firm faith and will of the servicepersons and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation without fail under the uplifted great banner of Songun.
					
					 Through the peculiar performance, they powerfully demonstrated the might of rapidly efflorescing folk music and dances.
					
					 At the end of the performance Kim Jong Il warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the creators and artistes of the art troupe staged a splendid performance with songs and dances of Korean style. He extended high appreciation and thanks to them for their success in the performance.
					
					 He said that the State Folk Art Troupe is a merited art organization with a long history as it has created and staged many music and dance pieces suited to the emotion and sentiment of the Korean people in the past true to the WPK's Juche-oriented literary and art idea and line, thus making a positive contribution to the development of the national culture and art and the education of the people in patriotism. He highly appreciated the feats performed by the creators and artistes in creating art.
					
					 Very pleased to learn that the young artistes who have just graduated from a university, in particular, displayed high artistic skills, he noted that the prospect of the Juche-oriented art is immensely rosy as the tradition of folk music and dance is being steadfastly carried forward by such revolutionary and talented reserve artistes.
					
					 He said that it is the consistent policy of the WPK to create many folk cultural and art works national in forms and socialist in contents, underscoring the need for the creators and artistes to create more excellent works in line with the requirements of the era of Songun and thoughts and feelings of the Korean people by displaying great creative enthusiasm and thus become genuine creators and ardent defenders of socialist culture and art.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for creating art, noting that the above-said art troupe has an important role to play in carrying forward and developing the national cultural heritage and Juche-oriented music.
					
					 Among the audience were department directors and first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee and its other leading officials.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Bolivian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Bolivian President
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Evo Morales Aima, on his re-assumption of office as President of Bolivia.
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in line with the common desire of the people aspiring after independence and progress, Kim in the message wished the President greater success in his work.

articles.title: Official Commendations Awarded to Crewmen
articles.content:
Official Commendations Awarded to Crewmen
						
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The title of Labor Hero and orders of the DPRK were conferred on the crew of the trading cargo ship Jisong 5.
					 The crewmen displayed the spirit of defending the headquarters of the revolution, the heroic self-sacrificing spirit and the revolutionary comradeship in rough wind and waves.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place on Thursday.
					
					 The title of Labor Hero and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of the National Flag 1st Class were conferred on ex-Captain Hong Sun Gyong and ex-Chief Engineer Sin Myong Hwan and Order of the National Flag 1st Class on ex-Electrical Engineer Kim Chang Hae, ex-Boatswain Mun Thae Jin and ex-Mate Jo Kwang Ho. These commendations were conveyed to their bereaved families.
					
					 Orders were also awarded to all other crewmen of the ship.

articles.title: Masses Praying for National Reunification Held
articles.content:
Masses Praying for National Reunification Held
						
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- "Masses praying for national reunification on the occasion of the Day of Buddha's Attainment of Great Wisdom" took place at temples in different parts of the DPRK on Jan. 22.
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and those of the provincial, city and county committees of the federation and priests, monks and believers of different temples. 
					
					 Speeches were made and prayers for national reunification were read out at the masses.
					
					 Speakers said that they are marking the Day of Buddha's Attainment of Great Wisdom at a time when all the people across the country have turned out in a vigorous struggle to bring about a radical turn in improving the people's standard of living amid the high-pitched drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge in response to the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 All the Buddhists in the north and the south of Korea should give momentum to the atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving reconciliation, cooperation and unity this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for the founding of the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, upholding the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!", they stressed.
					
					 They called upon the entire Korean nation to accelerate the nationwide grand march for reunification while frustrating all challenges of the anti-reunification forces with the concerted efforts and thus brilliantly glorify 2010 as a year of opening a new phase of independent reunification.

articles.title: Books Published
articles.content:
Books Published
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Publishing House has brought out books.
					The book "Reunification-related Anecdotes about President Kim Il Sung" contains stories based on the strong will of the President, who, deeply concerned about the unhappiness and sufferings of the nation from the division of the country caused by outside forces, had dedicated his heart and soul to the efforts for national reunification all his life. 
					
					The book "Reunification-related Anecdotes about General Secretary Kim Jong Il" tells stories about his ideas of national reunification and his undying exploits and noble virtues in the leadership of the reunification cause.

articles.title: Study Tour of School Youth and Children Starts
articles.content:
Study Tour of School Youth and Children Starts
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country started their study tour for 1,000-ri journey for national liberation to commemorate the 85th anniversary of the 1,000-ri journey for national liberation traveled by President Kim Il Sung and the 35th anniversary of the first study tour to trace its course organized by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 A meeting for starting the tour took place at Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on Friday.
					
					 Present there was Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The participants in the tour laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statue of the President at the school and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, in a report at the meeting stressed that in the 1,000-ri journey of revolution the members of the tour group should clearly show the true looks of the school youth and children who display the spirit of devotedly defending the leader while steadily inheriting the lineage of Mangyongdae, the lineage of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The group, made up of more than 1,000 persons, left Mangyongdae, a sacred place of revolution, amid the warm send-off by school youth and children and working people in the city of Pyongyang. It will arrive in Phophyong, a land of historic significance, through Kaechon, Hyangsan, Kanggye, Hwaphyong and other places.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Cause Carried Forward
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Cause Carried Forward
five years ago, President Kim Il Sung embarked on a 1,000-ri (400km) journey for national liberation in his teens.
					 The historic journey led to heralding the dawn of national liberation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and providing the origin of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 More than half of the journey was little different from pathless track.
					
					 In particular, the route from Kanggye to Huchang (then) was exposed to wild beasts even in the daytime.
					
					 However, the President continued the journey through primitive forests with a firm determination to avenge his father and the Korean people upon the Japanese imperialists for their occupation of the country. 
					
					 He arrived at Phophyong ferry on February 3, Juche 14 (1925), thirteen days after he left his native place, Mangyongdae. He took a view of his fatherland and then of a foreign land across the river with bitter grief and sorrow.
					
					 Then he moved toward the foreign land, singing the "Song of the River Amnok" with a grim resolve not to return home until Korea became independent.
					
					 True to that day's resolve, he led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and accomplished the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 The glorious history of the Korean revolution is unthinkable without his immortal feats.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President has been carried forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kimchol Takes Lead in Increased Production Movement
articles.content:
Kimchol Takes Lead in Increased Production Movement
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex (Kimchol) are taking the lead in the efforts to glorify this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as a year of proud victory to be recorded in the history of the country.
					 From a historical point of view they have steadfastly defended the leader and the Party with increased steel production in each rigorous period of the revolution, making a tangible contribution to the building of an independent national economy and socialist construction.
					
					 Just after the liberation of the country, they restored the severely destroyed furnace and coke oven in a short period of time with their own effort and technology and produced more pig iron than the record high in the years of the Japanese imperialists' rule over the country, thus contributing to the building of a new country.
					
					 In the postwar period of a great Chollima upswing they made such a world-startling miracle as producing 270,000 tons of pig iron from a blast furnace with a rated capacity of 190,000 tons to fully display the mettle of the Korean people.
					
					 With such gigantic steel producers as Kimchol, the country could greet a heyday in economic construction in the 1970s and 1980s.
					
					  They also boosted production in the "Arduous March", forced march, with indomitable faith and in the spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 In spite of so many difficulties, they have established a new pig iron-making system totally based on local raw materials and fuel and their own technology, updated its continuous roughing machine by themselves and laid a solid foundation for putting such major processes as concentrates transport and hot rolling at full capacity.
					
					 The Kimchol workers have effected an unprecedented upswing in steel production to support the major sectors of the people's livelihood improvement after General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the complex in last December to encourage it to stand in the van of this year's drive.

articles.title: New Poster Encourages People to Fulfill This Year's Tasks
articles.content:
New Poster Encourages People to Fulfill This Year's Tasks
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A poster titled "Radical Turn in People's Livelihood Improvement!" has been created in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to arouse the people to the implementation of the tasks set forth by the joint New Year editorial published by leading newspapers of the country.
					 Depicted in the poster is a lady holding her child in her arms with a broad smile on her face, half buried by overflowing daily necessities, against the background of a well-lighted street.
					
					 Looking at the poster, which reflects the implications of the editorial, the people visualize this year to be overbrimmed with their happiness.
					
					 The Korean servicepersons and people are striving hard to bring their happiness earlier.
					
					 The employees of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex sent a letter to the working people of all sectors and units throughout the country, calling for a sweeping campaign to bring about in the people's living a radical improvement, unprecedented in the history of the country.
					
					 In response to their call they are working as they did in the 1970s, mass-producing consumer goods and harvesting bumper crops, unaffected by the world-wide food crisis.
					
					 The updated light industry factories are directing efforts to improving the quality of consumer goods.
					
					 All the economic sectors and units are fully providing the light industry factories in time with raw and other materials needed for the production of consumer goods.
					
					 The stockbreeding, fish farming and fruit production bases are making redoubled efforts to boost their production.
					
					 The construction of dwelling houses for 100,000 families in Pyongyang are progressing apace with those built in Mansudae Street as a model and towns and rural villages have been facelifted to suit the socialist features in the 21st century.

articles.title: Offensive for Improvement of People's Living Urged
articles.content:
Offensive for Improvement of People's Living Urged
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an editorial today calls upon all the people to vigorously launch the general offensive for improving the people's standard of living in the same vim and working spirit as displayed by the employees at the Songjin Steel Complex (Songgang) under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and thus glorify the brilliant era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the nation.
					 The stamina and working spirit of Songgang represent the mettle and spirit of Songun Korea dashing towards the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation, full of confidence in sure victory and optimism under the banner of Juche, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 They are run through with the staunch revolutionary spirit, the matchless heroism and the spirit of creation of the Korean working class, and contain all patterns of faith and will and working attitude that the Korean people should possess in the present era of great surge.
					
					 The stamina and spirit of workers of Songgang are culmination of noble moral obligation and intense loyalty to their leaders, an eruption of strong mental power based on national self-pride and matchless courage and an expression of indomitable and stubborn offensive spirit and popular heroism.
					
					The workers of Songgang wrought such miracle in history as giving birth to Juche steel as they displayed their fidelity as clean as a white gem to perfectly prove in a scientific and theoretical way and in practice President Kim Il Sung's idea on Juche iron and bring the plan of General Secretary Kim Jong Il into brilliant reality.
					
					 Self-esteem of the strong to explore the frontiers of science in the metallurgical industry its own way and by its own efforts and matchless pluck to make leap forward by covering others' hundred or thousand feet only with its one step--these are inveterate working disposition of all the workers, technicians and officials of Songgang.
					
					 The strong will to make a breakthrough for advance in the do-or-die spirit and collectivism whereby all the workers, technicians and officials form a large family and pool their wisdom and efforts for one purpose are the inveterate working spirit of Songgang.
					
					 We are sure to emerge victorious in the general advance for this year when we conduct the vigorous offensive in the do-or-die spirit to unconditionally implement the Workers' Party of Korea's idea and line to the last as the workers of Songgang did.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Planned Saber-rattling Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Planned Saber-rattling Blasted
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The 37th Division of the south Korean puppet army is planning to stage large-scale field tactical exercises in the areas of Okchon, Poun and Yongdong of North Chungchong Province from Jan. 25 to 28, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The warlike forces seek to hurl not only huge troops and equipment of the division but civilians, administrative officials and police into the projected war exercises under the pretext of coping with somebody's "infiltration." 
					
					 The puppet warlike forces are persisting in their dangerous war games against the north, swimming against the trend of the times when the desire of the fellow countrymen for peace on the Korean Peninsula is growing stronger as the days go by and thus straining the situation.

articles.title: Peace-loving DPRK's Stand Supported
articles.content:
Peace-loving DPRK's Stand Supported
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- British and Peruvian organizations issued statements in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in its statement on Jan. 15 held that the issue of concluding a peace treaty should have already been solved in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the only way of guaranteeing peace in the peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region to conclude a durable peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S., the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 We support the stand of the DPRK demanding the U.S. and its followers lift sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 There can be a sincere dialogue only when the sanctions are lifted.
					
					 We demand the U.S. withdraw all its forces of aggression and arms and equipment from south Korea as part of the efforts for concluding a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 We fully support the just stand of the peace-loving DPRK clarified in the statement of its Foreign Ministry.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in its statement on Jan. 13 expressed full support for the just stand and the Songun politics of the DPRK which has war deterrent strong enough to cope with the moves of the U.S. imperialists for aggression.
					
					 The statement called upon the progressives to extend full support to the Korean people in their struggle against the U.S. hostile acts toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study of Democratic Congo Meets
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study of Democratic Congo Meets
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo was held in Kinshasa on Jan. 14.
					 At the meeting Kamwiziku Octave, chairman of the committee, delivered a report on its work last year to be followed by speeches. An action plan for this year was made public there.

articles.title: Mexican Association for Friendship Inaugurated
articles.content:
Mexican Association for Friendship Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Puebla State Association for Friendship with the Korean People was inaugurated with due ceremony in Puebla City on Jan. 15.
					  Arturo Mauricio Juarez Lopez was elected president of the association at the ceremony.
					
					 A letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted there.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Jordan
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Jordan
						
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Jordanian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated on Jan. 15.
					Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan, was elected its chairman.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold political and cultural events highly praising the great feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the country, the revolution and independence of mankind on the occasions of the significant Day of the Sun and the February holiday.

articles.title: ATCC comenta la iniciativa sobre la firma del convenio de paz
articles.content:
ATCC comenta la iniciativa sobre la firma del convenio de paz
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ATCC) -- La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana sigue siendo inestable y ambigua entre la guerra y la paz debido al caduco sistema de armisticio, un resto de la Guerra Fria.
					Hoy dia, el prolongado estado de armisticio en la Peninsula Coreana, que no tiene precedentes en la historia mundial de treguas, es la bomba de tiempo a punto de explotar que amenaza a toda hora la seguridad regional de Asia oriental y el resto de Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					La firma del convenio de paz es el primer paso para asegurar el ambiente pacifico de esa peninsula.
					
					Esto no es un problema desvinculado con la desnuclearizacion de esa area.
					
					Si se resuelve ese problema, seran solucionados automaticamente los otros asuntos que garantizaran el proceso de paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Anteriormente, se realizaron durante 6 anos en medio de vicisitudes una serie de debates incluyendo las conversaciones a 6 bandas para la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Pero, esas negociaciones resultaron fracasadas repetidamente. Esto demuestra que la causa del fracaso no reside en el orden de solucion de los problemas sino en no haber solucionado correctamente el problema causal.
					
					Crear la confianza y acelerar mas la desnuclearizacion constituye la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el proposito principal con que ella propuso la firma del convenio de paz.
					
					Esta suscripcion es el comienzo de la creacion de confianza y servira de motivo para eliminar la desconfianza y establecer las relaciones de respeto mutuo e igualdad entre la RPDC y EE.UU. en el curso de esa labor.
					
					El aseguramiento de la confianza constituye la causa fundamental de la sustitucion del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea por el de paz.
					
					EE.UU. debe cumplir con toda su responsabilidad historica en la preservacion de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Hasta ahora, EE.UU. vino entrometiendose en el problema coreano como responsable directo de la firma del acuerdo mencionado y ejerciendo el control militar sobre el Sur de Corea.
					
					Nadie puede tomar el lugar de EE.UU. en reemplazar el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el de paz.
					
					EE.UU. habia expresado ya en varias veces su posicion oficial de no amenazar ni agredir militarmente a la RPDC y manifestado su voluntad de firmar el convenio de paz.
					
					Si EE.UU. tiene de veras la voluntad de coexistir en paz con la RPDC y desea la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, no habria ninguna razon ni condicion que le impidan proceder a la firma del convenio de paz.
					
					La RPDC contribuye muchisima importancia a la firma de tal documento.
					
					Esto parte de la posicion de principios del gobierno de la RPDC de resolver satisfactoriamente todos los problemas surgidos en las relaciones con EE.UU., inclusive la desnuclearizacion, y procurar la firme garantia de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo mediante la concertacion de dicho convenio.
					
					Este asunto sera solucionado sin complicaciones cuando EE.UU. valore correctamente la situacion cambiada y la corriente del desarrollo de la historia y tenga la voluntad politica de cambiar con audacia su politica sobre la RPDC conforme a sus intereses nacionales y a la aspiracion de los pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz.
					
					Resolver satisfactoriamente o no el mismo asunto tambien depende de la actitud de los paises interesados.
					
					Defender la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana conviene al interes comun de los paises interesados y todos los paises de la region de Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					La firma del convenio de paz no es un problema por el cual una parte beneficia o paga a la otra sino una cuestion politica que resulta provechosa tanto para ambas partes: la RPDC y EE.UU. como para toda la sociedad internacional y contribuye sustancialmente al desarrollo de la paz mundial.
					
					La actitud y la posicion al respecto seran la pauta que distinguira quien desea o no la paz duradera de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					EE.UU. debe tomar lo mas pronto posible la valiente decision de cambiar el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea por el de paz viendo correctamente la corriente de la historia y la tendencia de desenvolvimiento de la situacion de hoy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a luchar con el temperamento y estilo de Songgang
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a luchar con el temperamento y estilo de Songgang
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ATCC) -- En un editorial difundido el dia 22, el diario Rodong Sinmun exhorto a todos a glorificar la epoca dorada de prosperidad, nunca vista en la historia nacional, a traves de la ofensiva general para mejorar la vida del pueblo bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con el temperamento y el modo de lucha del Complejo de Acero de Songjin, conocido aqui como Songgang.
					El temperamento y el modo de lucha de Songgang son precisamente los de la Corea del Songun que bajo la bandera del Juche, avanza intrepidamente hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera con gran fe en la victoria y optimismo, comienza el editorial y continua:
					
					Ellos se caracterizan por el fuerte caracter revolucionario, el heroismo incomparable y el impetu de creacion de la clase obrera de Corea y sirven de ejemplos de la conviccion, la voluntad y el modo de trabajo que debe poseer el pueblo coreano en la epoca de gran auge de hoy.
					
					Son la esencia de la noble obligacion moral e infinita fidelidad a su lider y a su dirigente y la expresion de la gran fuerza espiritual proveniente de la dignidad nacional, el gran coraje, el indoblegable espiritu ofensivo y el heroismo masivo.
					
					El nacimiento del acero Juche, milagro de la historia, es producto de la fidelidad inmaculada de los obreros de Songgang decididos a comprobar en lo cientifico-teorico y substancialmente la idea del acero Juche del Presidente Kim Il Sung y a llevar a la brillante realidad el proposito del Dirigente.
					
					Todos los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios de Songgang tienen el temperamento de lucha basado en la dignidad de los fuertes que quieren conquistar la cumbre tecnologica de la industria metalurgica al estilo coreano y con las fuerzas nacionales y el gran coraje con que pretenden llegar de un salto a lo que han llegado los otros con cien y mil pasos.
					
					Componen el modo de lucha de Songgang la ferrea voluntad de abrir la brecha de avance con la decision de vida o muerte levantandose mil veces de las caidas y el espiritu colectivista segun el cual todos los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios unen su inteligencia y fuerzas para el unico objetivo formando una gran familia.
					
					Sera definitiva la victoria de la marcha general de este ano si todos libran la ofensiva intrepida asumiendo la determinacion de la clase obrera de Songgang de materializar consecuente e incondicionalmente la idea y la linea del partido bajo cualesquier circunstancias adversas.

articles.title: Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek hereda tradicion de lucha heroica
articles.content:
Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek hereda tradicion de lucha heroica
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ATCC) -- Se halla el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek A la cabeza de las filas de gran marcha para registrar este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como el de victoria orgullosa en los anales de la patria.
					  La clase obrera del citado complejo tiene la tradicion de lucha orgullosa que defendio a costa de la vida al partido y el lider con la produccion del hierro en cada periodo severo de la revolucion y contribuyo grandemente a la edificacion de la economia nacional independiente y a la construccion socialista.
					
					  Despues de la liberacion (15 de agosto de 1945), los obreros de ahi rehabilitaron en corto plazo con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas el alto horno y el de coque destruidos gravemente y produjeron mucho mas el hierro colado que el maximo nivel de produccion en el periodo de la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones, de modo que hicieron aporte a la construccion de una nueva patria.
					
					  En el periodo de gran auge de Chollima de posguerra tambien manifestaron vigorosamente el espiritu y coraje de los coreanos al crear los milagros asombrosos: produjeron 270 mil toneladas de hierro colado superando la capacidad nominal de 190 mil toneladas.
					
					  Gracias a esta base de produccion de hierro Corea pudo abrir en las decadas de 1970 y 1980 la era de plena prosperidad de la construccion economica.
					
					  Tambien, en el periodo de la "marcha penosa", la forzada, los obreros del complejo vinieron apoyando con vigor al pais con la produccion de acero levantandose como las personas invulnerables con la conviccion indoblegable y la potencia espiritual de autoconfianza.
					
					  Superando con audacia las pruebas y dificultades establecieron el metodo de produccion de hierro colado al estilo coreano consistente en producir el hierro con nuestra materia prima, combustible y tecnica, transformaron modernamente por su cuenta propia la maquina de moldeado sucesivo de lingotes de forma de arco y prepararon la base solida capaz de poner en pleno funcionamiento los procesos principales de produccion como el transporte de minerales concentrados y el laminado en caliente.
					
					  Ahora, registran el ascenso sin precedente en la produccion de los materiales de acero e hierro necesarios a los frentes principales de la mejora de la vida del pueblo guardando en el corazon la confianza del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien le puso a la cabeza de la lucha digna del ano nuevo durante su visita al complejo realizada en diciembre del ano pasado.

articles.title: Entidades extranjeras apoyan la posicion justa y pacifica de Corea
articles.content:
Entidades extranjeras apoyan la posicion justa y pacifica de Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ATCC) -- Las entidades de Gran Bretana y el Peru hicieron publicas sendas declaraciones apoyando la declaracion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  La sucursal inglesa de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea, que tiene su sede en Espana, en su nota fechada 15, apunto que el problema de concertacion  del convenio de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana ya debia ser resuelto.
					
					  Senalo que solo la firma del permanente convenio de la paz entre la RPDC y EE.UU. es el unico remedio capaz de garantizar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Asia y el Pacifico y apoyo la posicion de la RPDC de que EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites revoquen la sancion contra esta.
					
					  Prosiguio que solo cuando se revoque esa sancion, sera posible realizar el dialogo verdadero y exigio que EE.UU. retire todas sus fuerzas armadas agresivas y pertrechos del suelo surcoreano como un eslabon de la firma del convenio arriba mencionado.
					
					  Expreso su  irrestricto apoyo a la posicion justa y pacifica de la RPDC aclarada en la declaracion del MINREX.
					
					  Por otra parte, el Instituto Cultural y de Amistad Peruano-Coreano, en la declaracion publicada el dia 13, subrayo que apoya totalmente la politica de Songun y la posicion justa de Corea que esta dispuesta de todo el disuasivo de guerra frente a las maniobras de los imperialistas yanquis tendentes a agredir a ella.
					
					  Llamo a la humanidad progresista a enviar el total apoyo y respaldo a la lucha del pueblo coreano contra las maquinaciones hostiles a Corea de EE.UU.
